## CommandLineParser.onExecute() method

This hook allows the subclass to perform additional operations before or after the chosen action is executed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected onExecute(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
